mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq(faq_idx, faq_category, faq_subject, faq_content) VALUES(#{faq_idx}, #{faq_category}, #{faq_subject}, #{faq_content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM faq ORDER BY faq_idx DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET faq_category=#{faq_category}, faq_subject=#{faq_subject}, faq_content=#{faq_content} WHERE faq_idx=#{faq_idx}
